content.question: Using information from the image, which of the following can be described as identifiable signs and symbols of a Chinese cultural landscape in San Francisco?

choices.label: The United States flag and the Taiwanese flag
The straight streets and the highly ornamental buildings
Signage in English and signage in Chinese
Cars lining city streets and seafood in restaurants

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Describe the spatial patterns presented in visual sources.
